org.apache.commons.math4.random.RandomGenerator

    org.apache.commons.math4.random
    Random Data Generation

    • Uses of RandomGenerator in org.apache.commons.math4.random

      Classes in org.apache.commons.math4.random that implement RandomGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RngAdaptor
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0. This class is made available for testing the new RNG implementations in existing applications. It will be removed in the next major release.
      class  SynchronizedRandomGenerator
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0. No replacement.
      Constructors in org.apache.commons.math4.random with parameters of type RandomGenerator 
      Constructor and Description
      SynchronizedRandomGenerator(RandomGenerator rng)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a synchronized wrapper for the given RandomGenerator instance.
